name: Heroic Labs
long_description:
At Heroic Labs, we proudly present our comprehensive suite of products, meticulously designed to address the multifaceted demands of the contemporary gaming industry. Our cornerstone offerings—Nakama, Hiro, Satori, and Heroic Cloud—comprise the Heroic Game Stack, an integrated platform delivering unparalleled performance and flexibility.

Heroic Labs is a company by a team of engineers with backgrounds in distributed databases, big data analytics and high-volume mobile application APIs, and game development. We want to make it effortless for any game studio to build beautiful social and multiplayer games which work at massive scale.
one_liner: Social Infrastructure for Games; Makers of Nakama game server, Satori…

name: Jam.gg (formerly Piepacker)
long_description:
At the crossroads of online gaming and video chatting, jam.gg is a web platform to play awesome multiplayer games with your friends. Jam.gg focuses on hyper accessibility with a patented technology cutting the internet bandwidth requirement by 15 on average. Jam.gg features top retro, pc indie and board games.

The project branched out in two companies in 2023 with Jam on one side and Onibi (https://onibi.gg/) becoming its own company. YC being on both cap tables.
one_liner: Jam.gg, play couch games online with friends

name: LootRush
long_description: We create an affordable way for gamers to start playing crypto games and a secure way for investors to earn yield through NFTs.
one_liner: A safe and friendly way to play crypto games.
